title: Visual Hybrid Science Inquiry System Design for Children with Autism Spectrum Disorder

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields, with foundational understanding of scientific inquiry methods and experimental design
context.additional_context: Strengthening system design competencies considering visual learning characteristics and scientific observation abilities of children with autism in BYOD hybrid environments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain methods for designing visual science experiment content that reflects the cognitive characteristics of children with autism
Learners can develop a hybrid learning system prototype applying multimedia cognitive theory and the scientific inquiry process
Learners perform scientific effectiveness verification procedures for digital tools designed to educate children with autism through project-based assessment

resources: Behavioral Observation Video Materials for Children with Autism

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
